to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: upgrading from apache to apache2 under debian
body:
It's not bad;
You have to fix a couple things in sites-enabled, the main one, was the fact
that it was pointing you at some folder, you've gotta move your directory
back to /var/www.
Other than that, I had a couple minor issues, but it went pretty good for
me.
HTH,
Thanks,
~~TheCreator~~
[My programs don't have bugs; just randomly added features]
